titles.title: A bill to provide for the reqliuidation of certain entries relating to orange juice from Brazil.
A bill to provide for the reqliuidation of certain entries relating to orange juice from Brazil.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Directs the U.S. Customs and Border Protection to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation (refund of duties) on certain entries of orange juice from Brazil during the periods August 24, 2005-February 28, 2007, and March 1, 2007-February 29, 2008, respectively.
